name: Hiroshi Abe
summary: Hiroshi Abe. Actor: Still Walking. Hiroshi Abe was born on 22 June 1964 in Kanagawa, Japan. He is an actor, known for Still Walking (2008), Godzilla 2000: Millennium (1999) and After the Storm (2016).
